text: Otherwise, if an 'await connection.wait_closed()' is cancelled, the _close_waiter will be cancelled, too. This raises an error, because when _read_task is done, it tries to set the result of the already cancelled _close_waiter.
title: Bugfix: Shield close_waiter from cancellation of wait_closed.
